plot: A suicidal girl starts a journey with a lonely boy and a homeless old lady after her grandfather's death, she discovers that life moves on as always no matter how difficult the present is.
title: Early Summer
plot_es: A suicidal girl starts a journey with a lonely boy and a homeless old lady after her grandfather's death, she discovers that life moves on as always no matter how difficult the present is.
